slides.title: 영어 실력을 향상시키는 5가지 효과적인 방법
slides.image_prompt: Landscape study card background with five soft gradient panels for Reading, Writing, Listening, Speaking, and Vocabulary, rounded corners, subtle paper texture, clean white space, modern color palette

slides.title: 1. 꾸준한 듣기 연습 (Consistent Listening Practice)
content: 매일 팟캐스트, 뉴스, 영화 등 다양한 매체 활용
쉐도잉(Shadowing) 기법을 통한 억양 및 발음 체득
slides.image_prompt: Horizontal flashcard background featuring headphones, waveform, and repetition arrows, soft teal and purple gradients, rounded border, lightly grained texture, spacious layout for text overlay

slides.title: 2. 어휘력 확장 (Expanding Vocabulary)
content: 에빙하우스의 망각 곡선을 고려한 분산 반복(Spaced Repetition)
slides.image_prompt: Modern flashcard-style background with layered cards, a gentle curve chart, and spaced repetition icons, pastel orange and mint gradient, rounded corners, subtle grid texture

slides.title: 3. 말하기와 발음 교정 (Speaking & Pronunciation)
content: 원어민이나 언어 교환 파트너와 대화 연습
정확한 발음 기호 및 강세 파악
실수를 두려워하지 않는 자신감 있는 태도
slides.image_prompt: Clean landscape card background with two chat bubbles, microphone icon, and feedback arrows, coral and navy gradient, soft glow around rounded edges, minimal texture

slides.title: 4. 영작문 연습 (English Writing Practice)
content: 첨삭 도구(Grammarly 등)나 전문가의 피드백 활용
slides.image_prompt: Elegant card background showing notebook lines, pen illustration, and checklist icons, blue and cream gradient, rounded corners, light paper grain, open space for overlay text

slides.title: 5. 영어로 생각하기 (Thinking in English)
slides.image_prompt: Landscape flashcard background with a thought cloud, arrows pointing directly to English keywords, soft lavender and blue gradient, rounded edges, calm textured backdrop
